overview:
I grew up on a block that shared a lawn mower, went to the dump for each other, watched out for each other, and had countless BBQs. As an adult, it has shocked me how disposable and disconnected some communities have become. People feel too busy and unable to slow down to get to know those around them. I believe that OhSoWe can be the bridge to connect individuals into neighbors to share, advocate, save resources, and trust each other.

As a web developer, Iâ€™m always looking for ways to make peoples lives simpler, more efficient, and higher quality using technology. In my past life I was helping state governments save money and resources by implementing elearning, assisting commute.com in connecting people with alternative travel options, and saving paper through various systems. Iâ€™m excited to be connecting my expertise, my experiences and my passion to help build something so important to the sustainability of our future with the OhSoWe team.
